divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing outside smoking a cigarette when I seen what looked like a bright white orb floating across the sky with no sound seconds later a smaller object came speeding up behind it and I thought that it was actually going to collide with it but it passed by it at extreme speeds and then disappered. While the first object kept at a steady slow speed across the sky until flying out of range of site.
Summary: Two bright lights one larger than the other that appeared white with blue aura
trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Springfield
There were 2 other sightings in Springfield on or around June 6th 2012
